Pre-Game Insights: The inauguration of the Copa América will take place on June 20, 2024 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia, with reigning champion Argentina playing against Canada.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Copa América 2024 will be played in 14 cities across the United States, with some of the largest stadiums in the U.S. serving as venues, including MetLife Stadium in New Jersey and AT&T Stadium in Arlington, Texas.
Others: The tournament will feature 16 teams: the 10 nations that make up CONMEBOL, and six from CONCACAF.
